    • Uses of Skatolo.Layout in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers

      Classes in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers with annotations of type Skatolo.Layout 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bang
      The Bang controller triggers an event when pressed.
      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.controllers with annotations of type Skatolo.Layout 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int Bang.getTriggerEvent() 
      Bang Bang.setTriggerEvent(int theEventID)
      By default a bang is triggered when the mouse is pressed. use setTriggerEvent(Bang.PRESSED) or setTriggerEvent(Bang.RELEASE) to define the action for triggering a bang. currently only Bang.PRESSED and Bang.RELEASE are supported.

    • Uses of Skatolo.Layout in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.widgets

      Classes in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.widgets with annotations of type Skatolo.Layout 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PixelSelect
      The PixelSelect controller can be dragged to select a location.
      Methods in tech.lity.rea.skatolo.gui.widgets with annotations of type Skatolo.Layout 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int PixelSelect.getTriggerEvent() 
      PixelSelect PixelSelect.setTriggerEvent(int theEventID)
      By default a bang is triggered when the mouse is pressed. use setTriggerEvent(PixelSelect.PRESSED) or setTriggerEvent(PixelSelect.RELEASE) to define the action for triggering a bang. currently only PixelSelect.PRESSED and PixelSelect.RELEASE are supported.
